name: Kastle Krush
description:
Kastle Krush is a strategy game in a fantasy world. You can build castle and defeat your opponent. Build your castle, use unique units and spells - find the best way to win or best way to lose. Enjoy yourself in the colorful world with pigs and horses.

Key Features:

  • Various buildings for build in your castle
  • Use spells to attack and defense
  • Huge scale battles, which include hundreds of units on each side
  • Network play: play with friends or with random players
  • Play vs AI: there are three levels of difficulty
